title: Wrong units for some experiments: lossch4, lossco, lossn2o, o3loss, o3prod
description:
Although the metadata says units are "mol m-3 s-1" as specified in the CMIP6 Data Description, the actual units are "molecules m-3 s-1". Divide by 6.022E+23 (Avogadro constant) to correct the units.
Update: New versions of all these variables have been published with the issue resolved.
